attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Bullet
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dark Call-GX
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
